title: Oru murai oru murai Lyrics Muppozhudhum Un Karpanaigal Song Lyrics
singerName: Andrea Jeremiah, Blaaze, GV Prakash Kumar
stanzas:
Singer:  G. V. Prakash Kumar, Blaaze, & Andrea
Song:  Oru Murai En Vizhigalai Paarayo
Lyrics: Thamarai
Music By : GV Prakash
Movie: Muppozhudhum Un Karpanaigal

Andhiyin veyyilai, pandhaduthe pei mazhai
Innilai solluthe, en kaadhalin vaanilai

oru murai oru murai, en vizhigalai paarayo
kanavugal kasindhida, adhu kadhaipadhai kelaayo
Paadhi kangalai moodugiren
meedhi kangalil thaedugiren
ullam puraamum unmugam
undhida kandaene

En nenjam engum pambukindra kaadhal
adhai sollivida vendum endru aaval
Ada enna vandhu sollvadhendru ketaal
enna seiven naan...

oru mottavilndha ottrai roja parthaen
En kattavilnda kaadhil solla ellum
adhai nambavillai nambavillai naanum
vaangavillai naan....

Palavarna vanna karkkal vaitha kaipai
nam peyargalai achchaditha koppai
ne thoongavendru kadha kadha porvai
thaedukindran naan....

Ne thottukena chirpi sangu tharavaa
Maan kutti padam muthucharam tharavaa
Thaen kutti pola thuvalthaangi tharavaa
enna naaan vaanga..

You got me empty on my pocket -stop it
You got me filling like a broke- oh no ..
face-o kili girl,... bommai girl
...make a feel incredible
i see the time, see the place, i wanna know
are you ready for my phone-callatic syllable...
ennadi time, ennadi place, ennadi show
are you ready for my phone-callatic syllable ..
gonna get her gonna get her, by my side
gonna get her gonna get her, in my life
gonna get her gonna get her, wrong or right
gonna get her gonna get her right right right (2) ..

Siripaai irukum unnaku veetil..
seyarkai aruvi tharalaam..
idhayam mulludhum eeram
adhanaal chedigal valarka tharalaam
azhagu seiyum saadhanam
vaanga thoandrum kaaranam
unnai serndha pinbudhaan
aliyum avatrin naanamum

Or pakkam vandhaal adhigamaai thudikkum
thallisendraal lapputhaappu adikkum
ada idhayathaai aval kayil thandhaal
enna seivaalo..

Unnai yendhi sella eppozhudhum irupaen
endru sollumpadi kaalanigal kodupen
orr thaevai endraal kaalmidhiyaai kidapaen
thaanginaal enna... ....................(Oru murai Oru ...)

ooooh..
what it is in your mind that you want too see
what can I get for you ..say
i give you parisu girl what ever parisu girl
you be my thulasi girl, you be so lovable
tell me what you like girl, tell me tell me what you like girl
tell me what you like girl, tell me tell me what you like girl
coz i would bring the moon down for you
and i would make them green turn too
and I would do whatever I do
and I would do will just for you ...

let me rewind,rewind, to a new time
bring the both chime, until you are mine

Unadhu periya padhathaal
arayin suvarai maraithu vidavaa..
Nilavin oliyil minnum mugathai
viralai neeti thodavaa...hey ...
Thajmahaal vaangalaam
sahjahanaai maaralaam
yerkavillai naan adhai
unnaku pinbu vazhvadhai ..

malar vetkangala romba romba alluppu..
viral modhirangal ippodhellaam salippu
ada thangathuku thanganagai edhukku
vaangavillai naan

aey.. ..oru murai oru murai, en vizhigalai paarayo
kanavugal kasindhida, adhu kadhaipadhai kelaayo
